content: the pattern consists of simple stitches and is beginner friendly the french beret has become a trend and it blends with most outfits materials 1 light weight yarn i used milk cotton yarn 2 3 75mm crochet hook 3 pair of scissors sizes toddler child tween adult medium adult large this pattern is for personal use only you can however sell the finished products and if selling online you can tag this shop as the designer please do not resell or share the pattern with others
